<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get SASE Config (v2.1)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v2.1/api/tenants/{tenant_id}/prismasase_connections/configs"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get a specific SASE connection config.

## Request
